channel.title: Socials & Hobbies on SnowFolio
channel.description: Recent content in Socials & Hobbies on SnowFolio

item.title: Discord
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About Discord is a popular communication platform primarily used by gamers to communicate via voice, video, and text. It allows users to create and join servers where they can chat with friends, join communities, and participate in group activities like gaming or streaming.

item.title: Fiverr
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About An online marketplace that connects businesses and individuals with freelancers who offer a wide range of services, including graphic design, writing, programming, and more.

item.title: Github
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About A web-based platform that allows developers to store and manage their code repositories and collaborate with other developers on open source projects.

item.title: Gitlab
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About A similar platform to Github, offering a range of features such as version control, issue tracking, continuous integration and deployment, and more.

item.title: Instagram
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About A social media platform that allows users to share photos and videos, follow other users, and interact with content through likes and comments.

item.title: Leetcode
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About An online platform that offers coding challenges and practice problems to help developers improve their coding skills and prepare for technical interviews.

item.title: LinkedIn
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About A professional networking platform that allows users to create a profile, connect with other professionals, and search for job opportunities.

item.title: Stackoverflow
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About An online community where developers can ask and answer technical questions related to programming and software development.

item.title: Twitch
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About A streaming platform primarily used for live video game streaming, but also used for streaming other types of content such as music, art, and talk shows.

item.title: Twitter
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About A social media platform where users can post short messages, called tweets, and interact with other users through likes, retweets, and replies.

item.title: Youtube
item.description: 1. My Bio LionKingOnIce 2. About A video-sharing platform where users can upload, watch, and share videos on a wide range of topics, from entertainment to education.
